title: Belagio Enterprises Polka Dot Fashion Flower Pin On Brooch, Black 5 1/2 inches
features: Hand wash, cold water, mild soap, air dry
description: The polka dot fashion flower Pin On Brooch is an exciting accessory to be used on clothing or home decor. It has a burlap look and texture. The flower comes with a lapel pin so it can be worn as a brooch. It also has a hairclip and is fantastic used as a hair accessory. Remove the metal findings on the back and glue or sew in place as a permanent embellishment.
